definition: generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb

sentences.english: The Shipper and the Chief Officer are discussing the torn bags of castor seeds at the Dispatch Office.
sentences.chinese: 发货人跟大副正在调度室谈论蓖麻籽袋子破损的事。

sentences.english: If you want your baby born early, you can eat scrambled eggs castor oil .
sentences.chinese: 如果想让宝宝早些出生，你可以吃些蓖麻油炒鸡蛋。

sentences.english: Preliminary tests indicate the substance found was Ricin.
sentences.chinese: 初步测试表明，该物质是蓖麻毒素。

sentences.english: Turkey Red Oil is derived from Castor Oil which has been treated to be fully dispersible in water.
sentences.chinese: 土耳其红油是来自蓖麻油已治疗得到充分分散在水中。

sentences.english: But God prepared a worm when the morning rose the next day, and it smote the gourd that it withered.
sentences.chinese: 次日黎明，神却安排一条虫子咬这蓖麻，以致枯槁。

sentences.english: To be safe, I prescribed an equal dose of castor oil for him.
sentences.chinese: 为了安全起见，我也给他吃了同样多的蓖麻子油。

sentences.english: Tiny quantities of either ricin or cyanide are fatal.
sentences.chinese: 蓖麻毒素或者氰化物只需少量即可致命。

sentences.english: The front subframe is modified for extra camber and castor.
sentences.chinese: 前副车架被修改为额外拱形和蓖麻。

sentences.english: Yeah, this is the same plant that gives us the beneficial castor oil .
sentences.chinese: 蓖麻是一种为我们提供有益的蓖麻油的植物。

sentences.english: Yeah, this is the same plant that gives us the beneficial castor oil .
sentences.chinese: 蓖麻是一种为我们提供有益的蓖麻油的植物。

sentences.english: The symptoms are like that of ricin but much more concentrated.
sentences.chinese: 它的症状和蓖麻毒素相似，但更浓缩。

sentences.english: A single gram of ricin, the bean's main toxin, is thousands of times more powerful than cyanide.
sentences.chinese: 一克蓖麻毒素毒效等于氰化物的上千倍。

sentences.english: Sometimes castor oil can also be used as an ebullient.
sentences.chinese: 有时蓖麻油还可以用作了热情洋溢。

sentences.english: Let me remind you how ricin works.
sentences.chinese: 我想提醒大家的是蓖麻毒素是如何工作的。

sentences.english: The deadliest plant in the world is the castor bean plant.
sentences.chinese: 世界上最致命的植物是蓖麻子豆。

sentences.english: This paper studies the method of extraction of ricinine in castor pomace.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了蓖麻渣和蓖麻籽中蓖麻碱的提取方法。

definition: mulberry tree, with leaves used to feed silkworms
